dialogues.text: [You hear some voices behind the rock slide]

options.text: Hello! Sebastian sent me to find you.

dialogues.text: Oh thank Terra! You have to get us out of here. We found some ancient treasury room, but when we paved our way through the crevice, a rock slide occurred blocked our way out.

options.text: How do you suggest I help you out?

dialogues.text: We tried using our pickaxes, but it's pointless. These rocks are too tough to break. A controlled explosion should do the trick.
You should place a dynamite stick north, west and east of the rock slide. That means you should look for 3 dynamite in total.
Finally, once the dynamite has been put in position, you will need a detonator. I'm sure all of these items can be found in the mines. Good luck!
